snippet: A pair of new deals will make it easier for music apps to incorporate content from artists' Twitter accounts; Sony Music named Dennis Kooker its president of digital business; and more.
abstract: A pair of new deals will make it easier for music apps to incorporate content from artists' Twitter accounts; Sony Music named Dennis Kooker its president of digital business; and more.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Music Apps Enlist Twitter, a New Hire at Sony Music
